alert.note: Alert for Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 8:54PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of through 930 PM PDT... At 853 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Julia Pfeiffer Burns State Park, or 7 miles southwest of Tassajara Hot Springs, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tassajara Hot Springs. This includes Highway 1 between Mile Markers 34 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest
